body.name: 100% Linen Throw Blanket with Fringe for Couch/Bed/Sofa/Gift, Natural Washed Flax Solid Color Soft Breathable Cozy Farmhouse Boho Home Décor - White, 55"x75"
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 54 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: MATERIAL - Made of 100% Premium Quality French Flax Fabric with Pre Washed, very soft, becomes softer after every wash. 160 ± 5% GSM (ATTENTION: There may be a little deviation because of the washing preshrunk process.) Certified by OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 for environmentally friendly, responsible and sustainable fabric production. The flax bedding can bring you a healthier life, durable for a long period.

SIZE - The 2 Layers Throw is about 55 x 75 inches (145cm x 180cm). Perfect for naps, reading, meditation, movie nights, or taking the chill out of the night air. It would offer more space to snuggle or cuddle up.

VERSATILE - Easy to carry. Used as a shawl, warm and stylish. It can be used in living room, game room, bedroom, guest room...Suitable for home, car, RV, hospital, motel, hotel...Great for couch, sofa, ottomans, family gathering, camping, picnic...You can enjoy the joy of family and travel throughout the year.

WASHING INSTRUCTION - Machine washable, gentle cycle wash under 60℃ with similar colors. Do not dry clean. Do not use detergent that contains bleach or whitener. Tumble dry at medium heat. Iron on medium heat if needed.

GIFT PACKAGE - Perfect gift for anniversary/ wedding/ thanksgiving party/ Christmas, holidays, birthdays, housewarming and more. We provide 24/7 customer service. If there's any problem with the product, please contact us, we will help you solve it within 24H.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a bereavement gift for a young widow. I bought it with the idea of presenting something with healing qualities. The recipient loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stunning linen throw was obviously crafted with exquisite care and attention to detail. But, in truth, what really blew me away was the elegant white box the throw came in--no ugly plastic bags or shrink-wrap here. I have to believe that any company who pays this much attention to the quality of its packaging must surely be equally diligent about assuring the quality of its products. And it shows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s beautiful but…
reviews.reviewText: Very nice high quality linen throw but it’s not white. It’s definitely a pale yellowish color. I had to return. Would make someone a very nice wedding gift and it’s packaged beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice heavier weight throw.
reviews.reviewText: This throw blanket has been my go to for travel. I like sleeping with my linen and this has been perfect for that. Being double layered it is a little heavier but not too much. It washes well and seems like it will last for years to come. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rough and heavy
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to like this blanket but after washing it, it became stiff like cardboard. It shredded terribly in the wash. DO NOT WASH WITH OTHER ITEMS it will get fuzz on everything. For the record, I’m aware linen will get softer with time. However I have owned this blanket 2 days and washed it 5 times, with little improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this throw to use as light cover! Just perfect!
